alert.note: Alert for Finney; Grant; Gray; Hamilton; Haskell; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:14PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Hamilton, southern Kearny, southwestern Finney, eastern Grant, southwestern Gray and Haskell Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT/1100 PM MDT/... At 1114 PM CDT/1014 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kendall to near Satanta. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Satanta around 1120 PM CDT. Sublette around 1130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lakin, Deerfield, Tice, Copeland and Holcomb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT/100 AM MDT/ for southwestern Kansas.

area.areaDesc: Finney; Grant; Gray; Hamilton; Haskell; Kearny
